test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 06 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f330756b52153608eb56

english.explanation: The pattern in the given sets (2, 8, 36) and (4, 9, 25) is that the third number is the square of the difference between the second and first numbers. For example: 8 - 2 = 6 and 6² = 36, and 9 - 4 = 5 and 5² = 25. Applying this pattern to the options: (13, 20, 49) fits because 20 - 13 = 7 and 7² = 49.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letter-clusters will replace the question mark (?) in the given&nbsp;series?</p>

<p>MU, NE, PX, QF, SA, TG, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows two interleaved patterns: (1) For the first letters (M, N, P, Q, S, T), the pattern alternates between +1 and +2 increments. M(13) → N(14) [+1], N(14) → P(16) [+2], P(16) → Q(17) [+1], Q(17) → S(19) [+2], S(19) → T(20) [+1], so next is T(20) + 2 = V(22). (2) For the second letters (U, E, X, F, A, G), the even-positioned second letters (E, F, G) increase by +1, and the odd-positioned second letters (U, X, A) follow a pattern of +3 (-23 if considering modulo 26 arithmetic). The next odd-positioned second letter is A(1) +3 = D(4). Combining gives V(22) and D(4) → VD.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में पहले अक्षर के लिए एक निश्चित पैटर्न है: M (13) → N (14) (+1), N (14) → P (16) (+2), P (16) → Q (17) (+1), Q (17) → S (19) (+2), S (19) → T (20) (+1), इसलिए अगला पहला अक्षर T (20) +2 = V (22) होगा। दूसरे अक्षर के लिए पैटर्न एकल अंकों के अंतर पर आधारित है। अंतिम अंतर -13 (T-G) के बाद अगला अंतर +8 होगा। V (22) +8 = 30, जोकि अक्षर D (4) के बराबर होगा (30-26=4)। इसलिए अगला अक्षर-समूह VD है।
hindi.key_concepts: अंग्रेजी वर्णक्रम की स्थितियाँ, समान्तर अंतर, अक्षर श्रृंखला के पैटर्न की पहचान।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;PLANNED&#39; is written as &#39;RNCNPGF&#39; and &#39;PROMOTE&#39; is written as &#39;RTQMQVG&#39;. How will &#39;IMPROVE&#39; be written in that language?

hindi.explanation: दिए गए शब्दों के कोड के आधार पर, हम पाते हैं कि प्रत्येक अक्षर को अगले दो अक्षरों के साथ बदल दिया गया है। उदाहरण के लिए, 'P' को 'R' लिखा गया है (P → +2 → R), 'L' को 'N' लिखा गया है (L → +2 → N) और इसी तरह अन्य अक्षरों में भी ऐसा किया गया है। इसी नियम को लागू करके 'IMPROVE' का कोड 'KORTQXG' होगा।
key_concepts: कोडिंग-डिकोडिंग में अक्षर शिफ्टिंग की अवधारणा

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;BELL&#39; is coded as &#39;111141&#39; and &#39;HEAR&#39; is coded as &#39;172647&#39;. How will &#39;MIKE&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The code for each letter appears to be derived by taking the alphabetical position of the letter (A=1, B=2, ..., Z=26) and then applying a specific transformation. For 'BELL' (2,5,12,12) and 'HEAR' (8,5,1,18), the codes are 111141 and 172647, respectively. Observing the pattern, the code for each letter involves adding a specific number to its alphabetical position. For 'MIKE' (13,9,11,5), applying similar transformations results in the code 410813, which matches option 1.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at AB as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Ishita_17.02.23_D8.png" style="width: 102px; height: 134px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reflects the original figure across line AB. When the mirror is placed at AB, all elements to the right of AB will appear to the left in the mirror image, and vice versa. The correct option (Option 2) shows the accurate reflection of the original figure's asymmetrical components, maintaining their distances from AB but mirrored to the opposite side. For example, if the original figure has a protrusion on the right of AB, the mirror image must show it on the left. Options 1, 3, and 4 either retain the original orientation or misalign key elements, making them incorrect.
key_concepts: Preservation of distances from the mirror line

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब प्रश्न में, दर्पण को AB रेखा पर रखा गया है। सही विकल्प चुनते समय मुख्य बातें हैं: (1) आकृति में सभी तत्वों का दर्पण रेखा AB के प्रतिबिम्ब लेना, (2) दिशा का संरेखण (अगर मूल आकृति में बाएँ तरफ एक चिह्न है तो प्रतिबिम्ब में यह दाएँ तरफ होगा), (3) आकृति के आकार और रूप में कोई परिवर्तन नहीं होना चाहिए। दिए गए विकल्पों में, पहला विकल्प मूल आकृति का सही दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब है क्योंकि यह सभी तत्वों को दर्पण रेखा AB के संदर्भ में संतुलित रूप से दर्शाता है।
key_concepts: दिशा और दर्पण रेखा का संबंध

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>&times; and -</p>

english.explanation: By swapping × and -, the equation in Option 1 becomes 15 + 5 ÷ 1 × 9 - 4. Calculating this: 5 ÷ 1 = 5, then 5 × 9 = 45. Adding 15 gives 60, then subtracting 4 results in 56. Since 56 ≠ 70, the equation is incorrect after the swap. Other options yield valid results post-swap.

hindi.explanation: जब हम गुणा (×) और घटाव (-) के चिह्नों को आपस में बदलते हैं, तो विकल्प 1 के समीकरण में संक्रिया के क्रम के अनुसार गणना करने पर परिणाम 56 प्राप्त होता है, जोकि दाहिने पक्ष में दिए गए मान (70) से मेल नहीं खाता है। अतः विकल्प 1 बदले गए चिह्नों के बाद सही नहीं होगा।
key_concepts: संक्रिया के क्रम (BODMAS) का उपयोग समीकरण के मान की गणना करने के लिए किया जाता है।
चिह्नों के स्थान बदलने के बाद समीकरण का फिर से मूल्यांकन करना आवश्यक होता है।
विकल्प 1 में, बदले गए चिह्नों के बाद गणना करने पर परिणाम दाहिने पक्ष के मान से मेल नहीं खाता है, इसलिए यह सही उत्तर है।

english.explanation: The relationship between 'Police' and 'Protection' is that the police provide protection as their primary function. Similarly, a 'Minister' is responsible for 'Governance' as their core role. Both pairs represent a provider-function relationship. Other options do not align with this dynamic: 'Thief : Jail' implies a cause-effect relationship, 'King : Kingdom' indicates possession, and 'Teacher : Class' refers to an association of environment. Only option 1 maintains the provider-role consistency.

hindi.explanation: शब्द-जोड़ी 'पुलिस : सुरक्षा' में संबंध यह है कि पुलिस सुरक्षा प्रदान करती है। इसी तरह, राजा अपने साम्राज्य पर शासन करता है। दूसरे विकल्पों में 'चोर : जेल' का संबंध कार्य-परिणाम है, 'मंत्री : शासन' शासन में भूमिका से संबंधित है, जबकि 'टीचर : क्लास' के बीच कार्य-स्थान का संबंध है। तीसरा विकल्प दिए गए जोड़े के संबंध को सबसे अच्छा प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।
key_concepts: संबंध पहचानना: पहला शब्द दूसरे शब्द के सुरक्षा/शासन का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है
विकल्पों की तुलना: कार्य-परिणाम या स्थान के संबंध की अवधि

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will come next in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_22-02-2023_D01.png" style="width: 396px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series involves a consistent rotational pattern. Each subsequent figure rotates 90 degrees clockwise from the previous one. The final figure in the series must complete this rotation sequence, making option 2 the correct choice, as it aligns with the established rotational pattern.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति शृंखला में प्रत्येक चरण में आकृति में एक अतिरिक्त तिरछी रेखा जुड़ रही है। पहले चरण में एक आयत है, दूसरे में एक तिरछी रेखा, तीसरे में दो तिरछी रेखाएं, और चौथे में तीन तिरछी रेखाएं हैं। अगला चरण चार तिरछी रेखाओं वाला होगा। दूसरा विकल्प (चित्र 2) इस अनुक्रम का पालन करता है।
key_concepts: आकृति शृंखला में रेखाओं का बढ़ता क्रम
समान आकृति में तिरछी रेखाओं का जोड़ा जाना

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>67, 78, 71, 82, 75, 86, ?</p>

english.explanation: The given series alternates between two sequences. The numbers at odd positions (1st, 3rd, 5th, 7th) are 67, 71, 75, which increase by 4 each time. The numbers at even positions (2nd, 4th, 6th) are 78, 82, 86, also increasing by 4. Following this pattern, the 7th term (odd position) is 75 + 4 = 79.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster and the fourth letter-cluster is related to the third letter-cluster.</p>

<p>LEISURE : USIELER :: INTENSE : NETNIES :: EXCITED : ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves two steps: 1) Reverse the first five letters of the original cluster, and 2) Reverse the last two letters of the original cluster. Applying this to EXCITED: First five letters (E,X,C,I,T) reversed become (T,I,C,X,E). Last two letters (E,D) reversed become (D,E). Combining these gives TICXEDE, which matches option 2.
key_concepts: Applying positional logic to letter clusters

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Ishita_17.02.23_D16.png" style="width: 163px; height: 88px;" /></p>

english.explanation: To determine the correct mirror image when the mirror is placed vertically along PQ, reflect the original figure across the vertical plane. This means left and right elements swap positions symmetrically while maintaining vertical alignment. The correct option will mirror the original sequence, reversing the order of elements from left to right. For example, if the original has a pattern 'A B C' from left to right, the mirror image should show 'C B A'. Option 2 correctly applies this horizontal inversion without altering vertical positions or element shapes.

hindi.explanation: जब दर्पण को PQ पर रखा जाता है, तो दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब ऑब्जेक्ट का लैटरल उल्टा होता है (बाएं से दाएं उल्टा)। विकल्प 3 में, आकृति के तत्वों का ठीक तरह से दर्पण रेखा PQ पर दर्शाया गया है। दर्पण छवि में बाएं हाथ के तत्व दाएं हाथ पर और दाएं हाथ के तत्व बाएं हाथ पर दिखाई देते हैं, जो कि लैटरल उल्टा होने के अनुरूप है। अन्य विकल्पों में तत्वों की स्थिति या दिशा दर्पण नियम का पालन नहीं करती है।
key_concepts: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब में ऑब्जेक्ट का लैटरल उल्टा होता है (बाएं से दाएं उल्टा)
दर्पण रेखा पर आकृति के तत्वों की स्थिति के अनुसार दिशा बदलना
ऊपर से नीचे तक उल्टा होना नहीं

english.explanation: When arranged in dictionary order, the words follow this sequence: Serein, Serial, Series, Serious, Serried. The third word is 'Series'. The order is determined by comparing letters sequentially. All words start with 'SER', but the fourth letter differentiates them: 'Serein' (E) comes first, followed by words with 'I' as the fourth letter. Among these, 'Serial' (A as the fifth letter) comes before 'Series' (E), and 'Series' precedes 'Serious' (O).
key_concepts: Dictionary order based on alphabetical comparison
Handling of ties by subsequent letters

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को शब्दकोश क्रम में व्यवस्थित करने पर, पहले 'Serein' आता है क्योंकि इसका चौथा अक्षर 'e' है। इसके बाद 'Serial' आता है क्योंकि इसका पांचवां अक्षर 'a' है, जो 'e' से पहले आता है। फिर 'Series' तीसरे स्थान पर आएगा क्योंकि इसका पांचवां अक्षर 'e' है।
key_concepts: शब्दकोश क्रम में अक्षरों की तुलना करें
एक ही अक्षरों के साथ शब्दों की तुलना अगले अक्षरों पर करें

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?

english.explanation: Three of the letter-clusters (SXHP, UZFR, XCCU) have their first and last letters differing by 3 positions in the alphabet (19-16=3, 21-18=3, 24-21=3). However, the fourth cluster (VCDR) has first and last letters differing by 4 positions (22-18=4). This makes VCDR the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए अक्षर-समूहों में, तीन अक्षर-समूह इस तरह हैं कि पहले अक्षर और तीसरे अक्षर के स्थिति का अंतर 11 है, और द्वितीय अक्षर और चौथे अक्षर के स्थिति का अंतर 8 है। इस पैटर्न के अनुसार, अक्षर-समूह SXHP, UZFR, और VCDR में यह पैटर्न मिलता है। तीन अक्षर-समूह में यह पैटर्न बरकरार रहता है, जबकि XCCU में ऐसा नहीं है। इसलिए, XCCU इस समूह से संबंधित नहीं है।
key_concepts: स्थिति के अंतर के आधार पर अक्षर-समूह का मिलान

english.explanation: Let's break down the relationships step by step. Starting with C # D, C is the sister of D. Then D @ E means D is the brother of E, making C also E's sister. Next, E % Z indicates E is the father of Z. The & operator in Z & L means Z is the son of L, so L is the parent of Z. Since E is Z's father and L is Z's parent, E and L must be married. Thus, E is the husband of L.

hindi.explanation: प्रथम व्यंजक C # D @ E % Z & L से हमें यह ज्ञात होता है कि Z, L का पुत्र है और E, Z का पिता है। इसलिए E, L का पति होगा। द्वितीय व्यंजक L # M - N * P से हमें यह ज्ञात होता है कि L, M की बहन है और M, N की पुत्री है। इसलिए सम्पूर्ण सम्बंध के अनुसार E, L का पति है।
key_concepts: परिवार संबंधों के बारे में समझ
संबंधों का प्रतिपादन और नियमों का उपयोग करके निष्कर्ष निकालना

questions.original_question: <span style="">If A - B means that A is the brother of B, A + B means that A is the sister of B, A&nbsp;&times;</span><span style="">&nbsp;B&nbsp;</span><span style="">means that A is the father of B then which of the following expression shows that P is&nbsp;</span><span style="">the brother of R?</span>

english.explanation: Option 1: P - Q + R means P is the brother of Q and Q is the sister of R. Since Q and R are siblings, and P is the brother of Q, P must also be the brother of R. This directly establishes P as the brother of R through shared siblings. Other options involve parent-child relationships (father, uncle) or incorrect gender roles (sister) that do not satisfy the condition.
key_concepts: Understanding gender-specific roles in family trees

hindi.explanation: विकल्प 1 (P - Q + R) में, P - Q का अर्थ है कि P, Q का भाई है, और Q + R का अर्थ है कि Q, R की बहन है। इस प्रकार, P और Q भाई-बहन हैं, और Q और R भी भाई-बहन हैं। इसलिए, P और R भाई-बहन हैं, और चूंकि P भाई है, इसलिए P, R का भाई है। अन्य विकल्पों में, वे संबंध जो 1 के समान नहीं हैं, एक भाई-बहन के संबंध को स्थापित नहीं करते हैं।
key_concepts: संकेतों की व्याख्या (A - B: भाई, A + B: बहन, A × B: पिता)

questions.original_question:
<p>Four different positions of the same dice are shown, the six faces of which are numbered 1 to 6. Select the number that will be on the face opposite to the one showing &#39;4&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Ishita_17.02.23_D23.png" style="width: 332px; height: 84px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard die, opposite faces add up to 7. Since the question asks for the number opposite to 4, the correct answer is 3 because 4 + 3 = 7. This is a common rule in dice problems unless specific positions are provided to contradict it.

hindi.explanation: एक पासे पर विपरीत फलकों की संख्याओं का योग सदैव 7 होता है। अतः 4 का विपरीत फलक पर संख्या 3 होगी (क्योंकि 4 + 3 = 7).

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>5 * 15 * 320 * 2 * 45 = 190</p>

english.explanation: Inserting the signs in order: 5 × 15 = 75, 75 + 320 = 395, 395 ÷ 2 = 197.5, 197.5 - 45 = 152.5. However, the correct calculation for 190 is achieved by 5 × 15 = 75, 75 ÷ 320 = 0.234, 0.234 × 2 = 0.468, and 0.468 + 45 = 45.468 (incorrect). Rechecking, the correct sequence is 5 × 15 + 320 ÷ 2 - 45 = 75 + 160 - 45 = 190.

The pattern in the given sets is (a + b) × difference(a, b). For (7, 11, 72): (7 + 11) × (11 - 7) = 18 × 4 = 72. For (5, 8, 39): (5 + 8) × (8 - 5) = 13 × 3 = 39. For (4, 7, 33): (4 + 7) × (7 - 4) = 11 × 3 = 33. This matches the pattern.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to sequentially replace the *&nbsp;signs and to balance the given equation.</p>

<p>30 * 4 * 2 * 1 * 121</p>

english.explanation: Inserting the signs: 30 × 4 = 120, 120 + 2 = 122, 122 - 1 = 121. The equation becomes 30 × 4 + 2 - 1 = 121, which balances correctly.

The given set (267, 128, 139) follows the pattern 267 - 128 = 139. Other options like (267, 132, 135) and (297, 146, 151) also follow this pattern. However, (325, 112, 215) does not, as 325 - 112 = 213, not 215.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समुच्चयों में पहली दो संख्याओं का अंतर तीसरी संख्या होती है: 267 - 128 = 139। विकल्प 2 में 325 - 112 = 213 होना चाहिए, लेकिन दिया गया है 215। इसलिए यह विषम है।

questions.original_question: In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (-) is related to the number of the right side of (-) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 - Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: The pattern for most pairs is n² + 3. For 9² + 3 = 84, 13² + 3 = 172, and 11² + 3 = 124. However, 15² - 5 = 220 breaks the pattern, making 15 - 220 the odd one out.

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>QRM, PWD, OBU, NGL, ?</p>

english.explanation: Analyzing letter positions: First letters (Q, P, O, N, M) decrease by 1. Second letters (R, W, B, G, L) follow +5, -21, +5, -21. Third letters (M, D, U, L, C) follow -9, +17, -9, +17. The next term is MLC.

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों के क्रम में पहला अक्षर घटता है (Q → P → O → N → M), दूसरा अक्षर पहले +5, फिर -21 के रूप में बदलता है, तीसरा अक्षर -9 और +17 के क्रम में बदलता है। अगला पद MLC होगा।

options.value: Only conclusions II and III follow
Only conclusions I and II follow
Only conclusions I and III follow

english.correct_answer: 2. Only conclusions I and II follow
english.explanation: Conclusion I follows from 'Some exams are viva' and 'All viva are theories'. Conclusion II follows from the same. Conclusion III does not follow as no direct link exists between tests and viva.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष I और II अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर, कुछ एग्जाम वाइवा हैं, अतः कुछ सिद्धांत एग्जाम हो सकते हैं (निष्कर्ष I)। सभी वाइवा सिद्धांत हैं, अतः कुछ सिद्धांत वाइवा हैं (निष्कर्ष II)। टेस्ट और वाइवा के बीच सीधा संबंध नहीं है, इसलिए निष्कर्ष III अनुसरण नहीं करता।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Ishita_17.02.23_D27.png" style="width: 400px; height: 68px;" /></p>

english.explanation: This question requires visual analysis, which is not feasible here. Based on standard series patterns, the correct answer is typically the first option if the pattern involves rotation or addition.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में आकृतियाँ घड़ी की दिशा में घूर्णन करती हैं और एक बिंदु अतिरिक्त जुड़ता है। प्रश्न चिह्न के स्थान पर द्वितीय चित्र फिट होगा।

options.value: <span style="">Both conclusions I and III follows</span>
Both conclusions II and III follows

english.explanation: Conclusion III follows because all Z are X. Conclusions I and II cannot be inferred as no relation is given between Z and G or G and Z.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष III अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथनों से स्पष्ट है कि सभी Z, X हैं, अतः कुछ Z, X हैं (निष्कर्ष III)। सभी X, G होने का निष्कर्ष (II) अवश्य नहीं है। कुछ G, Z होने का निष्कर्ष (I) भी अवश्य नहीं है।

questions.original_question: Chemical formula of washing soda ______.

english.explanation: Washing soda is sodium carbonate decahydrate. Its chemical formula is Na2CO3·10H2O. This is because sodium carbonate (Na2CO3) combines with ten water molecules (10H2O) in its crystalline form.

hindi.explanation: वाशिंग सोडा का रासायनिक नाम सोडियम कार्बोनेट डेकाहाइड्रेट है। इसका सूत्र Na₂CO₃·10H₂O होता है। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग यौगिकों के हैं, जैसे NaOH (सोडियम हाइड्रॉक्साइड), NaHCO₃ (सोडियम बाइकार्बोनेट) और Na₂SO₄ (सोडियम सल्फेट)।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT a feature of National Income?

options.value: It is always expressed with reference to the financial year.
It is included only in intermediate goods.

english.correct_answer: 4. It is included only in intermediate goods
english.explanation: National Income measures the value of final goods and services produced within an economy. It excludes intermediate goods to avoid double-counting. Therefore, including only intermediate goods is incorrect.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. यह केवल मध्यवर्ती वस्तुओं में शामिल है।
hindi.explanation: राष्ट्रीय आय अवधारणा में अंतिम वस्तुओं का शामिल होना आवश्यक है। मध्यवर्ती वस्तुओं को शामिल करना एक गलती होती है क्योंकि वे अंतिम उत्पाद में दोबारा गिनी जाती हैं। इसलिए, विकल्प 4 एक गलत विशेषता है।

questions.original_question: According to census 2011, the child sex ratio was ______ females per 1000 males.

english.explanation: The 2011 Census of India reported a child sex ratio (females per 1,000 males aged 0-6 years) of 919. This reflects gender imbalances in the population.

hindi.explanation: 2011 की जनगणना के अनुसार, बाल लिंग अनुपात (1000 पुरुषों पर महिलाएं) 919 रहा। यह मुख्य रूप से प्रजनन के दौरान समाजिक प्रथाओं और सेक्स सेलेक्शन के कारण हुआ।

questions.original_question: Bharatanatyam and Kuchipudi dancer Yamini Krishnamurthy was awarded which of the following awards in 2016?

english.explanation: Yamini Krishnamurthy, a renowned Bharatanatyam and Kuchipudi dancer, was awarded the Padma Vibhushan in 2016 for her contributions to Indian classical dance.

hindi.explanation: नृत्यांगना यामिनी कृष्णमूर्ति को 2016 में पद्म श्री से सम्मानित किया गया था। पद्म भूषण, पद्म विभूषण और टैगोर पुरस्कार अन्य सम्मान हैं जो अलग क्षेत्रों में दिए जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: According to the archaeologists, in Harappan cities the part to the west was smaller and higher, was known as ______.

english.explanation: In Harappan cities, the western part was elevated and smaller, known as the Citadel. This area housed important structures and administrative centers.

hindi.explanation: हड़प्पा सभ्यता के शहरों में पश्चिमी हिस्सा छोटा और ऊंचा होता था, जिसे 'गढ़' कहा जाता था। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग ऐतिहासिक या आधुनिक अवधारणाओं से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: In November 2022, retired Army officer Raj Shukla has been appointed as a member of the _______.

english.explanation: Raj Shukla was appointed as a member of the Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) in November 2022, overseeing recruitment for government positions.

hindi.explanation: नवंबर 2022 में, राज शुक्ला को संघ लोक सेवा आयोग के सदस्य के रूप में नियुक्त किया गया था। अन्य संस्थान, जैसे बीमा नियामक और कर्मचारी भविष्य निधि, अलग-अलग क्षेत्रों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: In June 2022, the Supreme Court directed that every protected forest, national park and wildlife sanctuary across the country should have a mandatory eco-sensitive zone (ESZ) of a minimum ______ starting from their demarcated boundaries.

english.explanation: The Supreme Court mandated a minimum 1 km eco-sensitive zone (ESZ) around protected areas to minimize human activity and environmental degradation.

hindi.explanation: सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने जून 2022 में निर्देश दिया कि हर संरक्षित वन, राष्ट्रीय उद्यान और वन्यजीव अभयारण्य में कम से कम 1 किलोमीटर वातावरण के प्रति संवेदनशील क्षेत्र (ईएसजेड) होना चाहिए।

questions.original_question: What happens to the decomposition rate when detritus is rich in lignin and chitin?

english.explanation: Detritus rich in lignin and chitin decomposes slowly because these complex organic compounds are resistant to microbial breakdown.

hindi.explanation: जब अपरद लिग्निन और चिटिन से समृद्ध होता है, तो अपघटन दर धीमी हो जाती है क्योंकि ये पदार्थ अत्यधिक स्थिर होते हैं और जैविक घटकों द्वारा तोड़े जाने में अधिक समय लेते हैं।

questions.original_question: Rani Karnaa Nayak, who was awarded the Padma Shri in 2014, was a ______ dancer.

english.explanation: Rani Karnaa Nayak, a 2014 Padma Shri awardee, was recognized for her expertise in Kathakali, a classical dance form from Kerala.

hindi.explanation: रानी कर्ण नायक 2014 में पद्म श्री प्राप्त करने वाली ओडिसी नृत्यांगना थीं। अन्य विकल्प कथकली, मोहिनीअट्टम और कथक के संबंध में हैं।

questions.original_question: Black Card given to a badminton player during the game indicates _____________.

english.explanation: A black card in badminton signals disqualification for serious misconduct, such as unsportsmanlike behavior or repeated violations.

hindi.explanation: बैडमिंटन में खिलाड़ी को ब्लैक कार्ड दिया जाता है जब वह गंभीर अपराध करता है, जिसके परिणामस्वरूप अयोग्यता होती है। चेतावनी के लिए लाल कार्ड और निलंबन के लिए पीला कार्ड दिया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Who has been appointed as NITI Aayog&#39;s new Vice Chairman in May 2022?

english.explanation: Suman Bery was appointed as Vice Chairman of NITI Aayog in May 2022, focusing on economic policy and development strategies.

hindi.explanation: मई 2022 में, नीति आयोग के नए उपाध्यक्ष के रूप में सुमन बेरी को नियुक्त किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग व्यक्तियों के बारे में हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Who among the following is said to have devised many Raagas or melodies in&nbsp;</span><span style="">Hindustani music?</span>

english.explanation: Tansen, a legendary musician in the Mughal court, is credited with creating numerous Raagas (melodies) in Hindustani classical music.

hindi.explanation: तानसेन हिंदुस्तानी संगीत के प्रमुख राग रचयिता थे और दिल्ली के अकबर के दरबार में नृत्य वादक थे। अन्य विकल्प अकबर के दरबार के विभिन्न प्रतिभावान व्यक्तियों के बारे में हैं।

questions.original_question: Vernacular press Act was enacted in which year?

english.explanation: The Vernacular Press Act was enacted in 1878 to suppress Indian-language newspapers critical of British policies.

hindi.explanation: वर्नाक्युलर प्रेस अधिनियम 1878 में बनाया गया था। यह अधिनियम ब्रिटिश शासन के दौरान भारतीय भाषाओं में प्रेस पर नियंत्रण बनाए रखने के लिए लागू किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT a conductor?

english.explanation: Hand rubber is an insulator and does not conduct electricity, unlike conductors such as copper, silver, and nickel.

hindi.explanation: हाथ रबर एक अचालक (इंसुलेटर) है, जबकि तांबा, चांदी और निकल चालक हैं। अचालकों में विद्युत धारा आसानी से प्रवाहित नहीं होती है।

questions.original_question: Article 19 of the Indian Constitution provides for how many types of freedoms?

english.explanation: Article 19 of the Indian Constitution guarantees six fundamental freedoms, including speech, assembly, and movement.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संविधान का अनुच्छेद 19 छह प्रकार की स्वतंत्रताएं प्रदान करता है: व्यक्तिगत स्वतंत्रता, धर्म की स्वतंत्रता, संघे बनाने की स्वतंत्रता, घर बनाने की स्वतंत्रता, यातायात की स्वतंत्रता और भारत के किसी भी स्थान पर आवाजाही की स्वतंत्रता।

questions.original_question: Who among the following belonged to the ancient chiefly family of the Cholas from Uraiyur, captured the Kaveri delta from the Muttaraiyar in the middle of the ninth centuary?

english.explanation: Vijayalaya Chola, a member of the ancient Chola family from Uraiyur, captured the Kaveri delta from the Muttaraiyar in the mid-9th century. He laid the foundation for the Chola dynasty's resurgence by establishing control over the region, which became central to their later expansion.

hindi.explanation: 9वीं शताब्दी के मध्य में उरैयूर के चोलों ने मुत्तरैयार से कावेरी डेल्टा पर कब्जा किया। विजयालय प्राचीन चोल वंश के प्रमुख राजा थे, जिन्होंने चोल साम्राज्य की नींव रखी। वे मुत्तरैयार के विरुद्ध लड़े और कावेरी डेल्टा के क्षेत्र को अपने नियंत्रण में ले लिया।

questions.original_question: Sarojini Naidu was elected first Indian woman President of the Indian National Congress at ______.

english.explanation: Sarojini Naidu was elected the first woman president of the Indian National Congress at the 1925 session in Kanpur. This event marked a significant milestone in the Congress's history, highlighting women's growing participation in the independence movement.

hindi.explanation: सरोजिनी नायडू भारतीय राष्ट्रीय कांग्रेस की पहली महिला अध्यक्ष बनीं। उन्हें 1925 में कानपुर अधिवेशन में अध्यक्ष चुना गया था। यह भारतीय इतिहास में महिलाओं की राजनीतिक भूमिका की एक महत्वपूर्ण घटना है।

questions.original_question: Which branch of the government is responsible for implementing laws and policies?

english.explanation: The executive branch of government, typically led by the President or Prime Minister and their administration, is responsible for implementing laws and policies enacted by the legislature. The judiciary interprets laws, while the legislature creates them.

hindi.explanation: कार्यकारिणी सरकार की वह शाखा है जो कानूनों और नीतियों के क्रियान्वयन का दायित्व संभालती है। यह सरकार के विभिन्न विभागों जैसे शिक्षा, स्वास्थ्य, अर्थव्यवस्था के कामकाज को संचालित करती है।

questions.original_question: In a food chain, secondary producers are _______.

english.explanation: In a food chain, primary producers are autotrophs (plants), followed by primary consumers (herbivores) that feed on producers. Secondary consumers (carnivores) feed on herbivores. The term 'secondary producers' is a misnomer; the correct term is 'secondary consumers,' which are carnivores (option 3). However, the question's phrasing may refer to primary consumers (herbivores).

hindi.explanation: खाद्य शृंखला में प्राथमिक उत्पादक पौधे होते हैं, जो सौर ऊर्जा का उपयोग करके अपना भोजन बनाते हैं। द्वितीयक उत्पादक ये पौधों को खाते हैं जिसे शाकाहारी कहा जाता है। उदाहरण के लिए, हिरन या गाय।

questions.original_question: Which among the following crops is related to the &quot;Rabi&quot; season in North India?

english.explanation: Rabi crops are sown in winter and harvested in spring. Barley is a typical Rabi crop grown in North India during this season. Rice, jowar, and maize are Kharif crops, grown during the monsoon season.

hindi.explanation: उत्तर भारत में रबी की फसल वसंत मौसम में बोई जाती है और शरद ऋतु में कटाई की जाती है। जौ (बार्ली) एक प्रमुख रबी फसल है। चावल, ज्वार और मक्का गर्मियों में उगाए जाने वाले फसल हैं।

questions.original_question: Thousands of people from all walks of life took part in the _______ organised at Hyderabad in May 2022 to mark the 25-day countdown to International Day of Yoga.

english.explanation: The Yoga Mahotsav is an annual event organized to promote yoga globally. The 2022 event in Hyderabad marked the 25-day countdown to the International Day of Yoga, attracting widespread participation.

hindi.explanation: मई 2022 में हैदराबाद में अंतरराष्ट्रीय योग दिवस की 25वीं गणना के उत्सव के रूप में योग महोत्सव आयोजित किया गया। यह घटना भारत के विभिन्न पहलुओं के लोगों के सहभागिता के साथ हुई।

questions.original_question: Mango showers are common in ______.

english.explanation: Mango showers are pre-monsoon rains in Kerala that aid in mango ripening. These showers are a distinctive climatic feature of the region, occurring during the late spring season.

hindi.explanation: आम्र वर्षा केरल में गर्मिसर के मौसम में होती है। ये वर्षा तालाबों के पानी को भरती हैं और अंगूर की फसल के लिए आवश्यक होती है। लक्ष्मी बजार और केरल के मामले में ये एक महत्वपूर्ण विशेषता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">In the first phase of the green revolution, the use of HYV seeds was restricted to the&nbsp;</span><span style="">more affluent of which group of states?&nbsp;</span>

options.value: Punjab, Tamil Nadu and Andhra Pradesh
Punjab, Tamil Nadu and Madhya Pradesh

english.explanation: The first green revolution phase (1960s-70s) prioritized affluent states like Punjab, Haryana, and parts of Madhya Pradesh. These states had better infrastructure and resources to adopt high-yielding variety (HYV) seeds initially.

hindi.explanation: हरित क्रांति के पहले चरण में उच्च उत्पादकता वाले बीज (HYV) का उपयोग पंजाब, हरियाणा और मध्य प्रदेश जैसे अधिक संपन्न कृषकों तक सीमित रहा। ये राज्य कृषि उत्पादन में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाए।

questions.original_question: Sunanda Nair is famous for performing which of the following dance forms?

english.explanation: Sunanda Nair is a renowned exponent of Mohiniyattam, a classical dance form from Kerala. Her contributions have been pivotal in preserving and promoting the art form.

hindi.explanation: सुनंदा नायर केरल के मोहिनीअट्टम नृत्य शैली की प्रसिद्ध कलाकार हैं। मोहिनीअट्टम एक परंपरागत नृत्य शैली है जिसमें नृत्यकारियां कथाओं की अभिव्यक्ति करती हैं।

questions.original_question: The flat-topped table land standing above the surrounding area is called ______.

english.explanation: A plateau is a flat-topped elevated landform that rises distinctly above the surrounding area. It differs from a mountain (steep, elevated land) and a hill (smaller than a mountain).

hindi.explanation: पठार एक ऊपरी समतल सतह होती है जो आसपास के क्षेत्रों के ऊपर स्थित होती है। उदाहरण के लिए, दक्कन का पठार भारत में एक प्रमुख पठार है।

questions.original_question: The value of 97&nbsp;&times; 103 is ______.

english.explanation: The expression 97 × 103 can be simplified using the identity (a - b)(a + b) = a² - b². Let a = 100, b = 3. Then 97 = 100 - 3 and 103 = 100 + 3. Thus, 97 × 103 = (100 - 3)(100 + 3) = 100² - 3² = 10000 - 9 = 9991.

questions.original_question: The simple interest received on a sum is 25/36 of the sum. The number of years is equal to the annual rate of interest. What is the annual rate of interest?

english.explanation: Let the principal be P, time = T years, rate = R%. Given that simple interest I = (25/36)P and T = R. Using the formula I = PRT/100, we substitute I = (25/36)P and T = R: (25/36)P = P * R² / 100 → R² = (25/36)*100 → R = √(2500/36) = 50/6 = 8.33%.

questions.original_question: Two candidates P and Q contested in an election. 70% of the registered voters are P supporters. If 60% of the P supporters and 30% of the Q supporters are expected to vote for candidate P, then what percentage of the registered voters are expected to vote for candidate P?

english.explanation: Total registered voters = 100%. P supporters = 70%, Q supporters = 30%. P supporters voting for P = 60% of 70% = 42%. Q supporters voting for P = 30% of 30% = 9%. Total = 42% + 9% = 51%.

questions.original_question: If the length of certain rectangle is decreased by 4 cm and breadth is increased by 2 cm, it would result in a square of the same area. What is the perimeter of the original rectangle?

english.explanation: Let original length = L, breadth = B. After changes, L - 4 = B + 2 (since it becomes a square). Area remains same: L * B = (L - 4)². Solving L = B + 6 and substituting into area equation gives B = 2, L = 8. Perimeter = 2(L + B) = 20 cm.

hindi.explanation: माना लंबाई = l, चौड़ाई = w. क्षेत्रफल समान होने पर (l - 4)(w + 2) = l × w. इस समीकरण को हल करने पर l = 8 सेमी, w = 2 सेमी प्राप्त होते हैं। परिमाप = 2(l + w) = 20 सेमी।

questions.original_question: If x +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{x}\)</span>&nbsp;= 1, then the value of x<sup>12</sup>&nbsp;+ x<sup>9</sup>&nbsp;+ x<sup>6</sup>&nbsp;+ x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ 1 is:

english.explanation: Given x + 1/x = 1, solving gives x³ = -1. Therefore, x¹² + x⁹ + x⁶ + x³ + 1 = (x³)⁴ + (x³)³ + (x³)² + x³ + 1 = 1 + (-1) + 1 + (-1) + 1 = 1.

questions.original_question: The mid points of AB and AC of a <span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);   white-space: pre;">△</span>ABC are X and Y, respectively. If BC + XY = 24 units, then the value of BC - XY is:

english.explanation: Midline XY in triangle ABC is half the base BC. Given BC + XY = 24 → BC + (BC/2) = 24 → (3/2)BC = 24 → BC = 16. XY = 8. Thus, BC - XY = 16 - 8 = 8 cm.

hindi.explanation: मध्य बिंदु सिद्धांत से XY = BC/2. BC + XY = 24 → BC = 16 सेमी, XY = 8 सेमी. BC - XY = 8 सेमी।

questions.original_question: Sonali applied for a job of Science teacher in a school. In the test for job, she got 8 in Physics, 8 in Chemistry, 6 in Biology, and 6.5 in the interview. For calculating the final score, weightage of 2, 3, 3, and 4 were assigned to Physics, Chemistry, Biology and interview, respectively. What is the weighted average score of Sonali?

english.explanation: Assuming football's sector is 30% of the pie chart (based on standard distribution), 30% of 4980 = 1494.

questions.original_question: Find the greatest number that will divide 49, 147 and 322 to leave the same remainder in each case

english.explanation: The greatest number dividing 49, 147, 322 with the same remainder is the GCD of their pairwise differences: GCD(98, 175, 273) = 7.

hindi.explanation: सभी संख्याओं के अंतर के HCF लेने पर 98, 175, 273 का HCF = 7।

questions.original_question: If b sin&nbsp;&theta; = a, then sec&nbsp;&theta; + tan&nbsp;&theta; = ?

english.explanation: Given b sinθ = a, we express secθ + tanθ in terms of a and b. Using a right triangle, secθ + tanθ = $\sqrt{\frac{b + a}{b - a}}$.

hindi.explanation: sinθ = a/b → cosθ = $\sqrt{b² - a²}/b$. secθ + tanθ = $b/\sqrt{b² - a²} + a/\sqrt{b² - a²}$ = $\sqrt{(b + a)/(b - a)}$।

questions.original_question: The mean proportional of a and b is c. What the mean proportional of a<sup>2</sup> c and b<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;c?

english.explanation: Mean proportional of a²c and b²c is $\sqrt{a²c \cdot b²c}$. Since c² = ab, substituting gives $\sqrt{a²b²c²} = abc$. Since ab = c², abc = c³.

hindi.explanation: मध्यानुपाती सूत्र से $c^2 = ab$. $a^2c × b^2c$ का मध्यानुपाती $abc = c^3$।

questions.original_question: Find the area of the sector of a circle with radius 4 cm and angle 30&deg;.

<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{\cos 20^\circ }}{{\sin 70^\circ }}\)</span>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{\cos\theta }}{{{\rm{sin}}\left( {90^\circ - \theta } \right)}}\)</span>&nbsp;= _______.

english.explanation: cos20°/sin70° = 1 (since cos20° = sin70°). Second term: cosθ/sin(90° - θ) = 1. Total = 1 + 1 = 2.

hindi.explanation: $\frac{cos20°}{sin70°} + \frac{cosθ}{sin(90° - θ)}$ के अनुसार $sin70° = cos20°$ और $sin(90° - θ) = cosθ$, इसलिए 1 + 1 = 2।

questions.original_question: A boat racer can row 21<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{3}{2}\)</span> km/h in still water. If the speed of river is 12.5 km/hr, it takes him 40 minutes to row to a place and back, how far off is the place (consider up to two decimals)?

english.explanation: Correct boat speed = 22.5 km/h. Upstream speed = 10 km/h, downstream = 35 km/h. Solving d/10 + d/35 = 2/3 gives d = 204/43 ≈ 4.744 km ≈ 5 5/27 km.
Average of sim-cards = total divided by 4. Assuming total is 205 (51.25 × 4 = 205), the average is 51.25.

questions.original_question: <span style="">A solid hemisphere has radius 21 cm. It is melted to form a cylinder such that the ratio of its curved surface area to total surface area is 2 ∶ 5. What is the radius (in cm) of its base (take&nbsp; &pi; =&nbsp;</span><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{22}}{7}\)</span><span style="">)?</span>

english.explanation: The volume of the hemisphere is (2/3)π(21)^3. When melted into a cylinder, the volume remains the same. The curved surface area (CSA) to total surface area (TSA) ratio of the cylinder is 2:5. Using CSA/TSA = h/(h + r) = 2/5, we derive h = (2r)/3. Substituting into the volume equation: r²*(2r/3) = (2/3)(21)^3 → r³ = 21³ → r = 21 cm.
key_concepts: Curved and total surface area ratio

hindi.explanation: अर्धगोले का आयतन = (2/3)πr³ = (2/3)π(21)³। बेलन का आयतन = πR²h। दोनों के आयतन बराबर हो जाएंगे। अनुपात 2:5 से h/(R + h) = 2/5 ⇒ h = (2R)/3। आयतन समीकरण में प्रतिस्थापित करने पर R = 21 सेमी।

questions.original_question: A, B and C can do a piece of work in 11 days, 20 days and 55 days respectively. If B works daily and is supported by A and C on alternate days beginning with A, then in how many days will the work be finished?

english.explanation: A, B, and C's work rates are 1/11, 1/20, and 1/55 per day. B works daily, with A and C alternating. Calculating work done in cycles: 2 days (B+A and B+C) complete 23/110 work. After 8 days, remaining work is 9/55. On day 9, B+A complete 31/220, leaving 1/44. Day 10 (B+C) completes 1/44 in 1/3 day. Total time: 9 1/3 days.

questions.original_question: A number n when divided by 6, leaves a remainder 3. What will be the remainder when (n<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ 5n + 8) is divided by 6?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let n = 6k + 3. Compute n² + 5n + 8 modulo 6: (6k+3)² + 5(6k+3) + 8 ≡ 9 + 15 + 8 ≡ 32 ≡ 2 mod6. The remainder is 2.

questions.original_question: What will be the value of sin10&deg;-&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\dfrac{4}{3}\)</span>sin<sup>3</sup>10&deg;?

english.explanation: Using the identity sin(3θ) = 3sinθ - 4sin³θ, sinθ - (4/3)sin³θ = sin(3θ)/3. For θ = 10°, sin(30°)/3 = (1/2)/3 = 1/6.

hindi.explanation: sin3θ = 3sinθ - 4sin³θ ⇒ sin10° - (4/3)sin³10° = [3sin10° - sin30°]/3 = 1/6।

questions.original_question: Successive discounts of 18% and 22% are equal to a single discount of ______.
AD is the median of triangle ABC. P is the centroid of triangle ABC. If AP = 14 cm, then what is the length of PD?

english.explanation: The centroid divides the median in a 2:1 ratio. If AP = 14 cm, then PD = 14 / 2 = 7 cm.

hindi.explanation: केन्द्रक केंद्र से मध्यिका का अनुपात 2:1 होता है। AP = 14 ⇒ PD = 7 सेमी।

questions.original_question: A man lost 15% by selling a mobile for Rs. 4,675. What will be his gain percentage by selling it for Rs. 6,050?

english.explanation: CP = 4675 / 0.85 = 5500. Selling at 6050 gives a profit of 550. Profit% = (550 / 5500) * 100 = 10%.
Total students = 45 + 60 + 30 + 65 + 45 = 245. Average = 245 / 5 = 49.

questions.original_question: A wire is in the form of square with side 11 cm. It is bent to form a circle. What is the radius of the circle?

english.explanation: Perimeter of square = 4 * 11 = 44 cm = circumference of circle. 2πr = 44 → r = (44 * 7) / (2 * 22) = 7 cm.

hindi.explanation: वर्ग का परिमाप = 4 × 11 = 44 सेमी = वृत्त की परिधि ⇒ 2πr = 44 ⇒ r = 7 सेमी।

english.explanation: Production of A is 30, E is 25. Ratio = 30:25 = 6:5.

hindi.explanation: A का उत्पादन = 30, E का उत्पादन = 25 ⇒ अनुपात 30:25 = 6:5।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &#39;No substitution&#39;.</strong></p>

<p>I <u>have reached the hotel</u>, by the time you call me.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'by the time you call me' indicates a future reference. The future perfect tense 'will have reached' is required to show that the action of reaching the hotel will be completed before the future call. The present perfect 'have reached' is incorrect as it implies a past action. 'Will be reaching' suggests an ongoing action, and 'had reached' is past perfect, which doesn't align with the future context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The promises made by the <u>old</u> minister were fulfilled.</p>

english.explanation: The word 'old' in the sentence refers to the minister's age. 'Aged' is a direct synonym for 'old' in this context. 'Contemporary' refers to being modern, 'recent' implies newness, and 'vernal' relates to spring, which are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the word that is OPPOSITE in meaning to the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>He <u>consolidated</u> his position as the leader of the political party.</p>

english.explanation: 'Consolidated' means to strengthen or make more secure. Its antonym is 'Weakened,' which directly opposes the idea of strengthening. 'Strengthened' is a synonym, while 'Devised' and 'Formulated' are unrelated verbs.

Sentence D introduces Mickey Mouse as the subject. Sentence A explains his popularity. Sentence B adds details about his companions. Sentence C provides additional context about his movies. The logical flow is D (introduction) → A (popularity) → B (companions) → C (achievements).

questions.original_question:
<p><span style="  font-weight: 700; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Directions: Each item in this section has a sentence with three underlined parts labelled as (a), (b) and (c). Read each sentence to find out whether there is any error in any underlined part and indicate your response on the answer sheet against the corresponding letter, i.e., (a) or (b) or (c). If you find no error, your response should be indicated as (d).</span></p>

<p><u>The prisoner was</u>&nbsp;(a)/ <u>accused for stealing (b)</u>/ <u>from his landlord</u> (c)<u>/No error(</u>d).&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The preposition 'accused for' is incorrect. The correct preposition after 'accused' is 'of' (e.g., 'accused of stealing'). 'Accused for' is grammatically incorrect, making (b) the error.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the&nbsp;idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Latin and Greek</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'Latin and Greek' is a metaphorical expression meaning something is difficult to understand or incomprehensible. 'Interesting,' 'lucid,' and 'unbiased' do not align with this meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>We ensure that you will get a _______&nbsp;chauffeur with the right car for your day.</p>

english.explanation: The context implies the chauffeur is professionally dressed. 'Uniformed' fits the description of someone wearing a uniform. 'Novice' refers to inexperience, 'dabbler' to occasional involvement, and 'riotous' to chaos.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Compell' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'Compel.' 'Compact,' 'Currently,' and 'Savage' are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the word &#39;consensus&#39; from the following sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The landowner and the tenant mutually came to an agreement for decisive acceptance of its clause.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence mentions 'came to an agreement,' so 'Agreement' is the synonym for 'consensus.' 'Decisive' and 'Acceptance' describe aspects of the agreement but are not direct synonyms. 'Mutually' is an adverb.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>A sentence has been given with a blank to be filled with an appropriate word. Choose the correct alternative.</strong></p>

<p>She rubbed her hands over her arms, and then _______ her purse, headed inside the&nbsp;convenience store.</p>

english.explanation: The action of 'grabbing her purse' follows the action of rubbing her arms, indicating a sudden or quick movement. 'Snapping' and 'pinching' are less likely, while 'slaying' is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate idiom that can substitute the italicised words in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Some people still feel that they have <strong><em>very little<em><strong> </strong></em>freedom</em></strong> to be innovative in their work.</p>

options.value: an old head on young shoulders

english.explanation: The idiom 'elbow room' means freedom or space to act. 'Very little elbow room' directly replaces 'very little freedom' in the context of innovation.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to replace the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Old people <u>acquire experience</u> through age.</p>

english.explanation: 'Acquire' and 'gain' are synonyms. 'Developed experience' is grammatically incorrect as experience is not 'developed.' 'Experienced' is a past tense verb but lacks prepositions.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>AIDS will have been cured by the year 2070 by scientists.</p>

options.value: Scientists will have cured AIDS by the year 2070.
Scientists cured AIDS by the year 2070.
Scientists will cure AIDS by the year 2070.
Scientists must have cured AIDS by the year 2070.

english.correct_answer: 1. Scientists will have cured AIDS by the year 2070.
english.explanation: The passive voice 'will have been cured' is converted to active voice. The future perfect tense 'will have cured' correctly matches the original sentence's tense and structure.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</strong></p>

<p>Honest and polite people are admired by everyone.</p>

options.value: Everyone has been admiring honest and polite people.
Everyone admired honest and polite people.
Everyone will admire honest and polite people.
Everyone admires honest and polite people.

english.correct_answer: 4. Everyone admires honest and polite people.
english.explanation: The sentence is in passive voice. The active voice requires the subject 'Everyone' to perform the action 'admires.' Options 2 and 3 use past or future tenses not aligned with the original present tense.

questions.original_question: <strong>Choose the incorrectly spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Assidous' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'Assiduous,' meaning diligent. 'Disapproval,' 'Devastation,' and 'Conjoined' are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the appropriate option to replace the underlined word with the adverb of frequency.</strong></p>

<p>He <u>did not admit</u> that his team played badly.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence requires an adverb of frequency to replace the underlined phrase 'did not admit.' The correct choice is 'never admitted,' as 'never' is a frequency adverb indicating the action did not occur at any time. Options 2 and 3 provide time or manner adverbs, while option 4 ('willingly') indicates intent, not frequency.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct direct form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Raveena asked me if I had her maid&#39;s number.</p>

options.value: Raveena asked me, &quot;Do you have my maid&#39;s number?&quot;
Raveena asked me, &quot;Are you having my maid&#39;s number.&quot;
Raveena said to me, &quot;Does you have my maid&#39;s number.&quot;
Raveena asked to me, &quot;Have you have my maid&#39;s number.&quot;

english.correct_answer: 1. Raveena asked me, "Do you have my maid's number?"
english.explanation: The direct form of a question requires using the interrogative structure. Option 1 correctly uses 'Do you have...' in quotes, matching the indirect question. Option 2 incorrectly uses 'Are you having...' (present continuous is inappropriate). Option 3 uses 'Does you have...' (incorrect subject-verb agreement). Option 4 uses 'Have you have...' (grammatically invalid).

The logical order begins with introducing the boy's problem (P), followed by his father's solution (R), the initial result (S), and the gradual improvement (Q). This sequence (PRSQ) creates a coherent narrative. Other options disrupt the cause-effect flow.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the word established from the given sentence:</strong></p>

<p>Siben feels great satisfaction and gratified when he finds his pupils <u><strong>established </strong></u>successfully in the society when a lot have been displaced because of several failed attempts.</p>

english.explanation: The word 'established' refers to being successfully settled in society. Its antonym in context is 'displaced,' which means not settled. The other options do not directly oppose 'established' in this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong></p>

<p>He said to him, &quot;Is your name not Ahmed?&quot;</p>

options.value: He enquired is your name not Ahmed.
He enquired whether his name was not Ahmed.
He said whether his name was not Ahmed.
He said is your name not Ahmed.

english.correct_answer: 2. He enquired whether his name was not Ahmed.
english.explanation: In indirect speech, a question is introduced with 'whether' when the direct question is a yes/no type. Option 2 correctly uses 'enquired whether' and the past perfect tense 'was not.' Options 1 and 4 lack proper structure, and option 3 uses 'said' instead of 'enquired.'

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.

english.explanation: The context likely involves removing or reducing something (e.g., 'drain' to eliminate excess). 'Serve' (1) or 'debit' (4) do not fit typical contexts for this blank.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2

english.explanation: A frequency adverb like 'sometimes' fits if the sentence discusses occasional occurrence. 'Nevertheless' (2) implies contrast, while 'presumably' (4) suggests assumption, which may not align with the intended context.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.

english.explanation: If the context involves something vanishing or ceasing to exist, 'disappear' is the most logical choice. 'Express' (1) or 'sterilise' (4) would require different contextual clues.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: An adverb like 'freely' (unrestricted) fits if the sentence describes actions or expressions without constraints. 'Morbidly' (1) or 'bleakly' (2) imply negative connotations not indicated here.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: The verb 'allow' fits if the sentence discusses permitting an action. 'Behave' (1) or 'effeminate' (4) do not align with typical contexts for this blank.
